name: AlmLabManagementTask
friendlyName: UFT One ALM Lab Management Run
description: Use this build step to run ALM server-side functional test sets.
author: Micro Focus

inputs.name: varAlmServ
inputs.label: ALM Server
inputs.helpMarkDown: The address of your ALM server, in the format http://(ALM server name):(port)/qcbin

inputs.name: varUserName
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user name that will access this ALM server during the build step run

inputs.name: varPass
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password for the user that will access this ALM server during the build step run

inputs.name: varDomain
inputs.label: Domain
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ALM domain in which the tests to run are stored

inputs.name: varProject
inputs.label: Project
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ALM project in which the tests to run are stored

inputs.name: varTestSet
inputs.label: Test Set ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID number (found in ALM) for the test set

inputs.name: varDescription
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: The description of this test set

inputs.name: varTimeslotDuration
inputs.label: Timeslot Duration (in minutes, minimum = 30)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The amount of time needed on the host to run this test set

inputs.name: varEnvironmentConfigurationID
inputs.label: Environment Configuration ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: To find the ID of your environment configuration, right-click the entity, copy the URL, and paste it to a text editor. Use the number associated with the EntityID at the end of the URL

inputs.name: varReportName
inputs.label: Report Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the file containing the ALM report link

inputs.name: varUseCDA
inputs.label: Use CDA for provisioning and deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use ALM CDA servers for deployment of the tests

inputs.name: varDeploymentAction
inputs.label: Deployment Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: The action to perform on deploying the server for running tests

inputs.name: varDeploymentEnvironmentName
inputs.label: Deployed Environment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of environment on which you are deploying the server

inputs.name: varDeprovisioningAction
inputs.label: Deprovisioning Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: The action to perform after the testing run when you are ready to end the server deployment
